meanings.definition: A book size resulting from folding a sheet of paper into sixteen leaves or thirty-two pages.
meanings.sent1: I found an old sextodecimo in the library, and it was so small!
meanings.sent2: The sextodecimo fit perfectly in my pocket for reading on the go.
meanings.sent3: The tiny sextodecimo was so cute, I couldn't resist buying it.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of sextodecimos was like a miniature forest of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The sextodecimo's small size made it easy to carry around everywhere.

meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a special section just for sextodecimos.
meanings.sent2: I purchased a sextodecimo to add to my collection of small books.
meanings.sent3: The sextodecimo looked like a tiny treasure among the larger volumes.
meanings.sent4: His love for sextodecimos was as big as his love for adventure.
meanings.sent5: The sextodecimo stood out on the shelf with its compact size.
